group_1.textRight: Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: A fool girl, yet with a troubled face.
Fool Girl is a fool girl,
so her face should look more fool girlish...

group_1.textRight: C'mooon! Too many fools!

group_1.textLeft: Alina is just speaking facts.

group_1.textRight: Ugh! And I just had an idea in my head!

group_1.textLeft: Haah?

group_1.textRight: An idea, idea!

group_1.textLeft: It's just a meaningless manga anyway.

group_1.textRight: It's not meaningless! It's a 4-koma manga!

group_1.textLeft: ...Scusi?

group_1.textRight: You don't know what a 4-koma manga is?
A manga that's made up of only four frames...

group_1.textLeft: In basic, creating a story composition with the last frame being a punchline.

group_1.textRight: They can get published in newspapers...

group_1.textLeft: There are even magazines dedicated to 4-koma@mangas...

group_1.textRight: ...Wait, you know plenty about them!

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, I know.

group_1.textRight: I wish you wouldn't make fun of me@in your weird way...!

group_1.textLeft: And yet refusing to learn, you are a fool girl.
Your last drawing of the medical theme@was a disaster, ya know.

group_1.textRight: It's true, the medical manga didn't feel right...
So I'm tackling the 4-koma next!
I'm sure my talent will fully bloom doing 4-koma!
But I'm still just experimenting with drawing,@so if you could look at it...

group_1.textLeft: Title is "Everyday Karin"...

group_1.textRight: Ah-! Wait-- when did-! Give that back~!

group_1.textLeft: Hm hm...
Noiosa.

group_1.textRight: Noiosa? ...Like it's noisy...?@No, mangas can't be noisy...

group_1.textLeft: Or peggiore.

group_1.textRight: Peggi...? What's that mean?

group_1.textLeft: "Dull", in other words.

group_1.textRight: That's awful!

group_1.textLeft: Growth is absolute niente. Substance is vuota.
You should be thankful Alina didn't shred it.

group_1.textRight: No, 4-komas are supposed to be a cheery,@light read...!

group_1.textLeft: Molto lame.

group_1.textRight: ...Mo...? What's that one mean...?

group_1.textLeft: "Dull", in other words.

group_1.textRight: Waahn!

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, however...
Perhaps Alina felt your creative passion.

group_1.textRight: ...I-is that a compliment...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe.

group_1.textRight: Maybe? That's a little doubtful...
You still haven't said enough...?

group_1.textLeft: No.
Alina just felt like drawing too.
